=UPDATE alfred.users
SET preferences = jsonb_set(
  COALESCE(preferences, '{}'::jsonb),
  ARRAY['{{ $json.preference_key }}'],
  '{{ $json.json_value }}'::jsonb
),
updated_at = NOW()
WHERE slack_user_id = '{{ $json.slack_user_id }}'
RETURNING slack_user_id, preferences;
